title: *NO FEE* Basement level w/ HUGE kitchen *SEPT 1*
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 105433999', 'Rent: $1,695 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking $200', '*NO FEE* Basement level w/ HUGE kitchen *SEPT 1*', 'Amazing location!', 'Rent directly through management and pay NO BROKER FEES!!', 'Please call, text or email.', 'Email preferred', 'IF YOU ARE REPLYING THROUGH CL, PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR ACTUAL EMAIL ADDRESS IN REPLY', 'Eric Sorenson', 'Leasing Agent', 'Micozzi Management 159 Cambridge St Allston MA 02134', 'Micozzi Management owns and professionally manages all of our buildings.', 'If this isnt exactly what you are looking for, follow the link below to check out our other apartment options.', 'All our listings are here', 'https://ygl.is/100156', 'As an equal opportunity housing provider, Micozzi Management provides housing opportunities regardless of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, physical or mental disability, familial status or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state or local law.', '56 Gardner St in Allston is a professionally managed building.', 'The location is amazing, just a 4 minute walk to the T at Packards Corner.', 'Within 5 minute walk to endless shops/restaurants as well as a major supermarket (Shaws on Comm Ave)', 'You cant get much closer to BU Campus and Brookline, without paying the outrageous Brookline rents!', 'Tenants here enjoy free heat and hot water', 'Laundry on site.', 'We would consider a cat in most units.', 'FEATURES', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Laundry in Building']
